meanings.sent1: The skilled massager relieved my sore muscles.
meanings.sent2: The massager at the spa has magic hands.
meanings.sent3: The friendly massager made me feel like a new person.
meanings.sent4: The massager's touch was like a soothing balm on my tired body.
meanings.sent5: I always look forward to my appointments with the talented massager.

meanings.sent1: I bought a new massager to help with my back pain.
meanings.sent2: The electric massager vibrated gently against my skin.
meanings.sent3: The massager hummed happily as it worked its magic on my shoulders.
meanings.sent4: Using the massager felt like having a personal masseuse at home.
meanings.sent5: The massager's design made it easy to target specific muscle groups.
